Name: Weapon Mastery
Description: +1 Hit with weapon attacks

Name: Fighter Training
Description:
Reduce by 1 the DC of the following Skill Checks:
-  Social checks (Authority, Diplomacy) and knowledge checks related to weapons, armor and fighting styles (Perception, Lore)
- Keep watch (Perception, Endurance)

Name: Guardian's Aura
Description:
You gain the Defender Aura power.
Enemies Taunted by you trigger Opportunity Attacks from you when ignoring your Taunt or shifting out of your Defender Aura.
Enemies hit by your Opportunity Attacks are Taunted until end of turn.

Name: Guardian's Shield
Description: When an ally in your Defender Aura is damaged by an attack, or an ally is damaged by an attack made by an enemy in your Defender Aura, reduce the damage by your CON.

Name: Heavy Armor Specialist
Description: Ignore your Skill Armor Penalty.

Name: Watchman's Challenge
Description:
When you target an enemy with an attack, that enemy is Taunted until end of your next turn.
Enemies Taunted by you trigger Opportunity Attacks from you when Shifting or ignoring your Taunt.

Name: Watchman's Eye
Description:
Add your Wisdom to your Reaction Modifier.
Add your Wisdom to the Crit Range of your Reaction attacks.

Name: Watchman's Vigilance
Description: +Wis to your Perception and Authority Skills.

Name: Sellsword's Ruthlessness
Description: Add your Intelligence to the damage of your Melee and Close attacks.

Name: Sellsword's Valor
Description: When you attack an enemy,that enemy subtracts double your Intelligence to the damage of their Reaction attacks that turn.

Name: Sellsword's Bargaining
Description: +Intelligence to your Authority and Bluff Skills.

Name: Controller Power
Description:
Gain an additional Wizard Daily Attack power, of a level equal to the level of your lowest Wizard Daily Attack power slot.
You can use an additional Daily Attack power per encounter (but no more than one per turn). +1 to Recharge rolls for your Wizard daily powers.

Name: Wizard Training
Description:
Wizard Training: Reduce by 1 the DC of the following Skill Checks:
- Social checks (Authority, Diplomacy, Trickery) and knowledge checks (Arcana, Lore) related to Arcane magic.
- Study and gather information from books (Concentration)

Name: Elemental Range
Description: Gain +Dex to the range of your Ranged and Area attacks, and to the size of your Line attacks.

Name: Wizard Flexibility
Description: Gain an additional At-Will attack power.

Name: Master Ritualist
Description:
Gain Ritual Training or Summon Familiar as a bonus Adventure Feat.
You learn an additional Heroic Ritual from each Ritual Training feat.
You learn an additional Paragon Ritual from each Paragon Ritual Training feat.
You learn an additional Epic Ritual from each Epic ritual Training feat.

Name: Abjurer`s Shield
Description:
Add double your CON to your Hit Points.
Add your CON to your Reflex

Name: Master Summoner
Description:
You treat Body Cover granted to you by your summons and allies as Superior Cover.
Add triple your Charisma to the HP of your Summons.

Name: Sneak Attack
Description: When attacking with Advantage with an Rogue Weapon, deal +1d4 damage per W. (Weapon damage modifiers apply to this damage)

Name: Rogue Training
Description:
Rogue Training: Reduce by 1 the DC of the following Skill Checks:
- Social checks (Authority, Diplomacy, Trickery) and knowledge checks (Perception, Lore) related to crime.
- Pick locks (Finesse), pick pockets (Trickery)
- Find traps (Perception) and disable traps (Concentration)

Name: Scoundrel's Weapon
Description:
You treat the following weapons as Rogue Weapons: Off-Hand Weapons, Short Bows.
You deal +Cha damage with Rogue Weapons.
+1 Hit with Dagger attacks.

Name: Scoundrel's Ambush
Description:
Gain +Cha Initiative.
Gain Advantage when attacking enemies that have not yet acted in the current encounter.
Gain Advantage against Slowed, Immobilized or Grabbed enemies.

Name: Thug's Weapon
Description:
You treat the following weapons as Light Weapons: Light Blades, Mace, Light Hammer.
+1 Hit with Weapon attacks with Off-Hand weapons and Maces.

Name: Meathead
Description: Add double your Strength to your HP.

Name: Whack in the Head
Description:
When you hit an enemy with a melee attack, that enemy is Dazzled until the end of your next turn.
When attacking Dazzled enemies, you can use Sneak Attack as if you attacked with Advantage, and you gain +Strength Crit Range.

Name: Duelist's Weapon
Description: You treat Light Blades as Light Weapons.

Name: Duelist's Cunning
Description:
Add your Intelligence to your Reaction Modifier.
While wielding two weapons, you gain a +Intelligence bonus to Arm against melee attacks.

Name: Duel
Description:
Gain the Duel power (Minor Action, 1/encounter, Taunt adjacent enemy until end of encounter).
When attacking enemies Taunted by you, you can use Sneak Attack as if you attacked with Advantage

Name: Swashbuckler's Weapon
Description: You treat the following weapons as Light Weapons: Light Blades, Hand Crossbow.

Name: Swashbuckler's Step
Description:
When you Shift, you can have that movement count as Climbing or as a Long Jump.
When you use the Shift Maneuver, you Shift your Charisma (instead of Shift 1).

Name: High Ground
Description:
When you use the Drop Maneuver, you reduce the falling distance by your Charisma (instead of by 1). If you fall adjacent to an enemy, you gain Advantage against that enemy this turn.
Gain Advantage on melee attacks against enemies on squares at a lower height than your space.

Name: Healing Word
Description: Gain the Healing Word power.

Name: Priest Training
Description:
Reduce by 1 the DC of the following Skill Checks:
- Social checks (Authority, Diplomacy) and knowledge checks (Arcana, Lore) related to Gods, Divine power and the undead.
- Heal the sick or wounded (Nature, Concentration)

Name: Faith Healing
Description:
When you use a Healing power, add Cha to the Surge Value of any character healing a Surge.
When you heal a character to full health, that character gains Cha Shield Points.

Name: Shield of the Gods
Description: You and allies within 5 squares gain Resist (Crit Damage). When you or an ally within 5 squares is critically hit by an enemy, they roll a save - on a success, the attacking enemy is knocked Prone.

Name: Ritual Training
Description: You gain Ritual Training as a bonus Adventure Feat.

Name: Fortune's Blessing
Description: At the start of each of your turns, randomly choose an ally that has not benefited from Fortune's Blessing on your previous turn. That ally gains +1 to Hit, Save, and all defenses until your next turn.

Name: Barbarian Training
Description:
Reduce by 1 the DC of the following Skill Checks:
- Social checks (Authority, Diplomacy) and knowledge checks (Perception, Lore) related to tribal organization
- Break doors, chests, objects (Athletics)
- Find food and shelter in the wilderness (Endurance)

Name: Savage Attack
Description: Your attacks deal +Constitution damage.

Name: Raging Resilience
Description: You add your Constitution to your Surge Value.

Name: Barbarian Charge
Description:
You do not become Hindered due to charging.
When you charge an enemy within 4 or more squares, you gain Advantage, and you can use a Barbarian melee attack instead of a melee Basic attack.

Name: Inner Peace
Description:
Inner Peace: While not in Berserker Fury, gain the following bonuses:
+3 Arm, -1 Hit and -1 Crit Range
You have Defenderâ€™s Aura.
Enemies ignoring your Taunt provoke opportunity attacks from you.

Name: Berserker Fury
Description: When you become Bloodied or use a Barbarian Primal attack power, you enter Berserker Fury until the end of the encounter. You may roll a save to avoid entering this state. While in Berserker Fury, you lose Inner Peace and gain +Con damage bonus on your melee attacks.

Name: Berserker Focus
Description: +1 Hit vs enemies Taunting you. At the start of your turn, if you are in Berserker Fury and not Taunted, you choose a random enemy closest to you. You are Taunted by that enemy until the end of the encounter.

Name: Inspiring Word
Description: Gain the Inspiring Word power.

Name: Tactical Advice
Description: Allies that can see or hear you gain+Int Initiative.

Name: Tactical Action
Description: Allies that can see or hear you gain +Int hit with Action Point attacks.

Name: Controller Power
Description:
Gain an additional Warlock Daily Attack power, of a level equal to the level of your lowest Warlock Daily Attack power slot.
You can use an additional Daily Attack power per encounter (but no more than one per turn). +1 to Recharge rolls for your Warlock daily powers.

Name: Shadow Curse
Description: Once per turn, when you target an enemy with an attack, the enemy is afflicted with your Shadow Curse until the end of the encounter. Enemies under the Shadow Curse treat you as having Concealment or, if you already have Concealment, as having Total Concealment.

Name: Shadow Pact
Description: Once per round, when an enemy under your Shadow Curse is reduced to 0 HP, the enemy's space becomes a zone of Difficult Terrain for your enemies until the end of the encounter. Enemies ending their turns in the zone or adjacent to it take Dex Shadow damage.

Name: Ranger Training
Description:
Reduce by 1 the DC of the following Skill Checks:
- Social checks (Authority, Diplomacy) and knowledge checks (Nature) related to natural and magical beasts.
- Track enemies (Perception, Nature) and avoid enemy tracking (Stealth)
- Hunting (Nature)

Name: Beast Companion
Description: You gain a Beast Companion that fights alongside you. See the Beast Companion section for detailed rules and companion options.

Name: Beast Strike
Description: You gain the Beast Strike power.

Name: Beast Recovery
Description: Whenever you heal a surge, your companion heals a surge for free. When you take a Short, Long or Extended Rest, your companion heals to full HP.

Name: Off-Hand Strike
Description: You gain the Off-Hand Strike power.

Name: Ranged Master
Description: You gain +Wis damage with Ranged and Area attacks.

Name: Prime Shot
Description: On ranged attacks against an enemy closest to you, if the target is not adjacent to you, gain +1 Hit, +1 Crit Range.

Name: Master Skirmisher
Description: You gain +Wis damage with Weapon attacks.

Name: Runner's Momentum
Description: While in combat, at the end of each turn, if you are 3 or more squares away from your initial position, you gain +1 to Hit and Defenses until end of next turn. If this bonus was already active, it increases to +2.

Name: Skirmisher's evasion
Description: You gain the Skirmisher's Evasion power.

Name: Druid Training
Description:
Reduce by 1 the DC of the following Skill Checks:
- Social checks (Authority, Diplomacy) and knowledge checks (Nature) related to Plants, Primal powers and spirits

Name: Paladin Training
Description:
Reduce by 1 the DC of the following Skill Checks:
- Social checks (Authority, Diplomacy) and Lore checks related to nobility and knighthood.
- Riding (Concentration) and taming mounts (Nature)
- Identify evil and deception (Perception)

Name: Bard Training
Description:
Reduce by 1 the DC of the following Skill Checks:
- Social checks (Authority, Diplomacy) and knowledge checks (Arcana, Lore) related to art, legends
- Create works of art and perform (Concentration)

Name: Warlord Training
Description:
Reduce by 1 the DC of the following Skill Checks:
- Social checks (Authority, Diplomacy) and Lore checks related to the military, teamwork activities.
- Teach and train others (Concentration)

Name: Human of Action
Description:
When you take a Full Rest, gain an additional Action Point.
+1 to Action Point Checks.
Gain Advantage on attacks made with an Action Point.

Name: Human Recovery
Description: When using Second Wind, you can roll a save to avoid spending a Vitality point. Gain +3 Surge Value (increase to +6 at level 11, +12 at level 21).

Name: Human Skill
Description: Gain Skill Training as a bonus feat.

Name: Dwarven Stubbornness
Description:
Reduce enemy Forced Movement against you by 1.
When you are knocked Prone, you can roll a save to avoid the Prone condition.
Ignore any Armor Speed Penalty.

Name: Dwarven Resilience
Description: You can use Second Wind as a Move Action.

Name: Dwarven Gut
Description: Partial Resist (Poison)

Name: Elven Step
Description: Each turn, you can ignore 1 square of extra movement cost due to Difficult Terrain.

Name: Elven Accuracy
Description: Gain the Elven Accuracy power.

Name: Halfling Nimbleness
Description: Resist(Opportunity Attacks).

Name: Halfling Dodge
Description: Gain the Halfling Dodge power.

Name: Halfling Innocence
Description: Partial Resist(Psychic)

Name: Elvish Beauty
Description: Enemies you haven't attacked on your last turn gain -1 Hit against you.

Name: Elvish Charm
Description: Gain the Elvish Charm power.

Name: Gnome Cautiousness
Description:
-3 Initiative
On Initiative roll, Invisible until end of first round or until attack.

Name: Gnomish Trick
Description: Gain the Gnomish Trick power.

Name: Orc Toughness
Description: Gain +3 HP (increase to +6 at level 11, +12 at level 21).

Name: Orc Smash
Description: Gain the Orc Smash power.

Name: Dragon Scales
Description: Resist (Missed Attacks), Resist (Fall Damage).

Name: Dragon Breath
Description: Gain the Dragon Breath power.

Name: Diabolic Bond
Description: While Bloodied, gain +1 Hit vs Bloodied enemies and Bloodied enemies gain -1 Hit against you.

Name: Diabolic Resistance
Description: Partial Resist (Fire)

Name: Diabolic Shield
Description: Gain the Diabolic Shield power.

Name: Goblin Mob
Description: Gain Cover while adjacent to a flanked enemy.

Name: Goblin Pull
Description: Gain the Goblin Slide power

Name: Minotaur Charge
Description: Not Hindered when charging. After hitting or missing with a Charge attack, the target grants Advantage until enf of your next turn.

Name: See Red
Description: Gain the See Red power.

Name: Long Limbs
Description: Gain Melee Reach 2 and +2 Range on ranged attacks.

Name: Goliath Resistance
Description: Gain the Goliath Resistance Power.

Name: Mob Attack
Description: Gain +1 Hit vs enemies adjacent to an ally, and -1 Hit vs enemies not adjacent to an ally.

Name: Shifty
Description: Gain the Shifty Kobold Power.
